data.text:
SUMMARY:

Oracle BPM SOA WCM UCM (Stellent) experienced technology professional with an in - depth knowledge of a variety of technologies used to create business applications.

My experience includes coding, Oracle BPM SOA Suite, Lombardi Teamworks, Stellent, Oracle (WCM), Aqualogic Enterprise Service Bus and Business Process Management software.

I am a skilledobject oriented programmer coding both.NET and Java. I have applied Agile and Data Modeling methods.

My responsibilities have included a database, programming, and application design and implementation.

My career has been focused on the development and implementation of Intranet, Internet and Extranet based business applications for large and small corporations.

I have provided technical leadership on a majority of these projects with a results-oriented work ethic.

TECHNICAL SKILLS:

Oracle BPM, SOA,WCM, PL*SQL, Stellent (Hypertext Content Server Templates, Hypertext Content Server Pages, Hypertext Content Server Forms, IdocScript functions and resource files, Site Studio, Workflow), Vignette, ALUI/Plumtree, Java, J2EE, Oracle 10g, PLSQL (Stored Procedures, Packages, Schemas),Microsoft SQL Server(stored procedures, triggers, rules, diagrams), Crystal Reports, SQL, AIX, Apache Web Server and IIS 4.0 - 5.0, and OO programming .

PROFESSIONAL EXPERIENCE:

Confidential

Sr. Oracle BPM, SOA Developer

Responsibilities:

Workflow design working sessions, and built system detailed designs, business process flows and workflows on Oracle BPM

Excellent hands on experience on Web Services (XML, XSD, XSLT/XPath, SOAP, WSDL, and WS-Policy)

Excellent experience in Transformations/ Transport /Design of service message flows / Service Orchestration

Setup of Oracle BPM shared platform running on WebLogic

Deployment of all the BPM application and hosting on BPM platform

Coding guidelines and best practices (code reviews activity)

Developed global application in OBPM

Designed and Implemented Decision Tables using Business Rules

Application data storage (single database node for now)

Daily backup, WebLogic versions 10.3, 10.3.2 (11g), Oracle SOA Suite 11g, BPM 11g, BPM 12c

Developed business process tasks, workflow tasks and control checks for various Business Process maps.

Confidential

Sr. Software Developer, Oracle, Java, .NET, Javascript

Responsibilities:

Documented Certification project, and provided gap analysis, coded applications using the following technologies AWS(Amazon Web Services), YUI, Dojo, MooTools, JQuery, Toad, Oracle 10g and11g database, Active Directory, LDAP, XML, XSLT, Cocoon, Maven, Apache Tomcat, UML, PL-SQL, Oracle Applications and Confidential Proprietary software's and applications.

Recorded; monitored, measured and communicated with Project Manager on status of specific projects and assignments.

Collaborated with Business Analyst and Application

Owner to analyze model, transform process and resolve methods to business problems.

Applied and developed local business processes, business analyst and development skills within that area of business or technical specialty.

Confidential

Oracle WCM/UCM, BPM, BPEL Java Software Engineer

Responsibilities:

Architecturally configure certification of Oracle WCM/ ECM and UCM Implementation Pre-Existing Oracle implementation

Design method to reduce planned import of External Data from Documentum

Analyzed process provided efficient method to reduce Timeframe of 3 months to 1 hour.

Applied Oracle WCM/UCM language coding and Database Best Practices to Optimize environment

Export existing Plone Repository to Oracle UCM moving physical files and associated Metadata.

Evaluate existing Taxonomy, Metadata Model

Implement and Configure Oracle 10gr4 and 11gr1 Site Studio and corresponding components

Build Site Studio website to replace Confidential internal and external website

Confidential

Java /.Net Software Engineer

Responsibilities:

Architecturally configurable certification of Oracle WCM/ ECM and UCM Implementation Pre-Existing Oracle implementation

Design Portlets and Community Web Pages for pre-existing content

Provided word and excel templates for interviews, produced JSP and IdocScript code

Applied Oracle UCM, Language coding and Database Best Practices to Optimize environment

Performance troubleshooting and Oracle UCM optimization.

Confidential

Java /.Net Software Engineer

Responsibilities:

Pre-Existing Oracle implementation from 2006 needed scalability do to increase in web traffic and content.

Provided word and excel templates for interviews, produced jsp and Idocscript code

Applied Oracle UCM, Language coding and Database Best Practices to Optimize environment

Reverse engineered environment creating a copy to resolve issues in Production

Performance troubleshooting and Oracle UCM optimization.

Confidential

Oracle UCM, BPM, BPEL Java /.Net Software Engineer

Responsibilities:

Provided Mentorship for in house developers anddesigned, developed, troubleshoot, test, and implement components in Stellent UCM develop environment as directed.

Performance troubleshooting and Oracle UCM optimization.

Confidential

Java /.Net Software Engineer

Responsibilities:

Provided SME Leadership for in house developers anddesigned, developed, troubleshoot, test, and implement components in Stellent UCM develop environment as directed.

Provided SOW and interview templates for gathering information from individual departments to create taxonomy, metadata and security structure

Created cross functional departmental and functional taxonomy for metadata, security.

Confidential

Java /.Net Software Engineer

Responsibilities:

Provided Mentorship for in house developers anddesigned, developed, troubleshoot, test, and implement components in Stellent UCM develop environment as directed.

Performance troubleshooting and Oracle UCM optimization.

Provided Mentorship for in house developers anddesigned, developed, troubleshoot, test, and implement components in Stellent UCM develop environment as directed.

Migrated data to Test and Production Stellent UCM environments.

Developed re-usable SiteStudio Templates, components, widget

Edited site hierarchy in Site Studio

Created contribution regions for content authors to add content

Created Stellent services, service handlers, and event filters in Java

Customized check-in pages and results pages

Coded and Designed Stellent web pages using Site Studio implementing Regions, Templates (Regions and Pages), Elements and Fragments.

Coded Java component services

Provided Content Management Administrator functions Portal customization

Designed and Implemented Security Metadata design using Active Directory

I am Fluent in Stellent developer technologies including HCST - Hypertext Content Server Templates, HCSP - Hypertext Content Server Pages, HCSF - Hypertext Content Server Forms and IDOC - IdocScript functions and resource files. I am also a seasoned JSP/Servlet/HTML Developer and Administrator.

Environment: Distributed Service Oriented Architecture AIX, IBM Websphere Server, Oracle SOA Suite, Oracle J-Developer, Oracle UCM 10.1, Stellent WCM 10gR4, Oracle 9x-11i, Oracle E-Business 12

Confidential

Java /.Net Software Engineer

Responsibilities:

Provided Mentorship for Stellent UCM and BPM and BPEL workflow design, coding complex BPM and BPEL processes us Coded against Oracle 12 E-Business Suite focusing on Medical Claims, Adjudication, HR and Sales.

I coded workflow process for Weblogic Servers.

Deploy BPM processes which include EJB workflow to clustered Weblogic Application Servers.

Environment: Distributed Service Oriented Architecture VMWare implementation, Oracle SOA Suite, Oracle J-Developer, Weblogic 10.3, ALSB( Aqualogic Service Bus),ALBPM 4x-6.0, Oracle 9x-11i, Oracle E-Business 12

Confidential

Java /.Net Software Engineer

Responsibilities:

Provided Mentor site design, creating RIA’s(Rich Internet Applications) code site design implementing Macromedia Flash and Adobe Flex 2, Actionscript 3.0

Environment: Apple (Mac), Adobe Flex, Javascript, Actionscript, Windows 2003, CSS, Ajax, Eclipse

Confidential

WebLogic Software Engineer

Responsibilities:

Architectured and coded distributed installation of WebLogic 10.3. As an Expert BEA, WebLogic Engineer, Implemented Weblogic Server, designed a distributed environment node managers, domain, weblogic servers, etc .

Create Stellent UCM and BPM and BPEL processes for Weblogic.

Deploy and optimize for performance application acquired from a third-party.

Provided BEA implementation and tuning direction and leadership for existing team. As BEA, WebLogic expert provided architectural design and implementation, usage and performance metrics and configuration.

I performed Unit Testing, verifying installation and implementation and configured JRockit providing anlaytics and statistical metrics identifying threads, processes causing performance issues.

Designed Network topology for Clustering, Loading Balancing and Failover

Environment: WebLogic 9x, 10x, Windows 2003, LDAP, Oracle 10g, MS SQL Server 2005, Java, C# and VB.Net .

Confidential

Java /.Net Software Engineer

Responsibilities:

Designed modular, flexible systems, user interface and UI widgets and and graphics programming.

Rapid prototyping and design of UI componenty for a leading-edge exercise monitor/controller application for live, virtual, and constructive training environment.

Environment: Putty, Java, J2EE applications, WebSphere Application Server 6x,, Perl, XML, XSLT, JavaScript. Subversion, WinSCP, Unix, IBM, AIX, Linux, Irix, HP-UX, Solaris and Windows 2003, NetBeans, Eclipse, IntelliJ. AWT, Swing, OpenGL and JOGL.

Confidential

BEA Software Engineer

Responsibilities:

As a Sr. BEA Engineer provided performance tuning for WebLogic,domain configuration,tuning (application, db, weblogic, jvm and operating system), node manager maintenance.

Create BPM and BPEL worflows.

Optimize BEA Aqualogic Service Bus and Aqualogic Business Process Manager in a distributed environment.

Environment: WebLogic 9.2, ALSB, ALBPM, Linux, Windows 2003 Server, LDAP

Confidential

Solutions Architect .Net / Java

Responsibilities:

Provided roadmap for Build and Release Management, Deployment Automation, and Test Orchestration, evaluated current framework and architecture for Continuous Integration.

Performed Gap Analysis and produced a road map between current state, industry recommendations and future roadmap.

Maintain and Support ESS approved J2EE Application Servers, Web Servers, Directory

Maintain internal tools and infrastructure
